summary: Driving innovation in smart energy systems and overseeing embedded R&D for large-scale national projects.

Directed hardware and software integration across metering ecosystems, ensuring secure and scalable operation.

Managed and mentored a cross-functional embedded systems team delivering production-grade smart energy and automation solutions.
